reviewText:
If all you're looking for is beautiful women in a softcore situation, Hot Body videos are your thing. Sadly, Hot Body is no longer producing DVDs and VHS tapes. They are getting a lot harder to find and prices for some of VHS tapes are really soaring. When you can find DVDs in the $10 range it's a great deal as well as the VHS tapes.

If you are a collector, this is one to have in your collection. All reviews I post are of tapes and DVDs I own and do not recommend videos on a whim. Just check out other recommendations I've made.

If beautiful naked women is what you are looking for, this video will not disappoint.

Those of you who have grown up with Hot Body videos know exactly what to expect. Beautiful women in a softcore adult dvd. Full frontal and even closeups. The sad thing is that Hot Body is no longer producing new dvd's or VHS tapes and the prices are actually starting to rise. Check out ebay for some ridiculous bidding on Hot Body VHS tapes. When you find dvd's for less than $17 snatch them up. There aren't many out there and this is definitely one to grab.
